message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $160 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $160 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $85 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $85 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $120?
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $120 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go any lower than $110.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $100. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
